title.narrative: Accountable Grant for Zimbabwe Girls' Secondary Education 2017-2022

description.narrative: This extension is a key element of DFID Zimbabwe’s strategy to be a ‘Leave No One Behind Trailblazer Country’. It will expand support to vulnerable rural girls, disabled children, and vulnerable boys. It will also extend the delivery of life skills and sexual reproductive health (SRH) training; provide training in child protection to stakeholders in districts worst affected by teenage pregnancy and early marriage and support the introduction of a new Guidance and Counselling school curriculum. This will be complemented by related activities under the proposed next phase of GEC, which will include developing SRH teaching materials, mapping child protection services, and strengthening protection of young women in the vulnerable period directly after they leave school.
